tweet.text: In 1997, Albright learned through Washington Post investigations that her parents had been born Jewish and her grandparents were victims of the Holocaust. During World War II, her parents had converted to Roman Catholicism to protect the family’s safety. https://t.co/SmnhxFNuJP https://t.co/iFWNGBcMws
